local_intent: Raise the grasped coke can by 0.10 m and verify it remains held.
assumptions: Object already grasped; overhead path clear for 0.10 m lift.
coherence_with_global: Implements the raise-and-verify segment of the global pick sequence: check grasp stability, lift 0.10 m with 1500 ms timeout, then confirm ObjectInGripper(coke_can).
